Content: Commander Security Forces - Jaffna, Major General Ruwan Wanigasooriya visited the Forward Maintenance Area Headquarters - North on Monday (16) with a view to taking a first hand account of its role and tasks. The visiting Commander, SF-J was warmly welcomed by Brigadier Lakshman Fernando, Commander FMA - N and all Commanding Officers, under Command to the FMA - N. All of them briefed the visiting commander on their specific roles. Subsequently, the Commander, SF-J addressed the troops and undertook a field visit to the under command formations.
